thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Advanced Disposal Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Advanced Disposal Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Advanced Disposal Services Inc:
* ADVANCED DISPOSAL ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.2 PERCENT TO $384.4 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $374.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES ‍2018 REVENUE TO BE BETWEEN $1,545 MILLION AND $1,565 MILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS ESTIMATED TO BE BETWEEN $426 MILLION AND $436 MILLION​
* SEES 2018 ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE BETWEEN $184 MILLION AND $194 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
